DIABOT_DB_HOST.description: MySQL host for the database. If you use the included Jaws DB addon you may need to enter this after deploying

DIABOT_DB_LIMIT.description: Maximum number of concurrent database connections

DIABOT_DB_NAME.description: MySQL Database name. If you use the included Jaws DB addon you may need to enter this after deploying

DIABOT_DB_PASS.description: MySQL Database password. If you use the included Jaws DB addon you may need to enter this after deploying

DIABOT_DB_USER.description: MySQL Database username. If you use the included Jaws DB addon you may need to enter this after deploying

DIABOT_QUEUE_HOST.description: RabbitMQ host. If you use the included CloudAMQP addon you may need to enter this after deploying

DIABOT_QUEUE_VHOST.description: RabbitMQ vhost. If you use the included CloudAMQP addon you may need to enter this after deploying

DIABOT_QUEUE_USER.description: RabbitMQ username. If you use the included CloudAMQP addon you may need to enter this after deploying

DIABOT_QUEUE_PASS.description: RabbitMQ password. If you use the included CloudAMQP addon you may need to enter this after deploying

DIABOT_QUEUE_NAME.description: RabbitMQ Queue name. If you use the included CloudAMQP addon you may need to enter this after deploying

DIABOT_QUEUE_EXCHANGE.description: RabbitMQ exchange to use. If you use the included CloudAMQP addon you may need to enter this after deploying
